official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the Office of Personnel Management should provide certain vocational rehabilitation services in its administration of the civil service disability retirement program.

summary.text: Declares that it is the sense of the Congress that the Office of Personnel Management should: (1) identify those individuals under the civil service disability retirement program who could benefit from vocational rehabilitation; and (2) advise them of the various vocational rehabilitation programs available to them, including those administered by the U.S. Employment Service and State vocational education divisions.
